On Mar 4, 2007, at 9:25 AM, Mike Schinkel wrote:

> Stefan Tilkov:
> > "Atom" commonly refers to the Atom Syndication Format
> > (the RSS alternative)
> > http://www.atomenabled.org/developers/syndication/atom-
> > format-spec.php "APP" is the "Atom Publishing Protocol"
> > (the REST API), http://
> > www.atomenabled.org/developers/syndication/atom-format
> > -spec.php
> >
>
> Am I going crazy, or didn't you just differentiate the two by  
> giving me the
> same URL for both?
>
> -- 
> -Mike Schinkel
> http://www.mikeschinkel.com/blogs/
